title: Create stub files for all modules
description:
Create empty classes/functions with docstrings for all backend modules.

## Files to stub
- config/settings.py - Settings class
- config/session_manager.py - SessionManager singleton
- config/logging_config.py - setup_logging()
- controllers/base_controller.py - BaseController class
- controllers/agatha_controller.py - AgathaController class
- models/analyze_agent.py - AnalyzeAgentModel class
- models/recommend_agent.py - RecommendAgentModel class
- models/execute_agent.py - ExecuteAgentModel class
- helpers/tools.py - get_ad_data_from_bq(), get_ad_data_from_meta()
- schemas/requests.py - AnalyzeRequest, ExecuteRequest
- schemas/responses.py - AnalysisResponse, RecommendationResponse
